articles.title: EU regulator endorses Takeda's dengue vaccine - ZAWYA
articles.description: European Medicines Agency (EMA) advisors backed the use of the Takeda vaccine for those aged 4 and older to prevent any of the four so-called serotypes of dengue
articles.content: The European drugs regulator on Friday recommended a dengue vaccine from Japan's Takeda, paving the way for a second vaccine for the mosquito-borne disease that causes millions of infections annually… [+2167 chars]
